{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "What's the matter? Why are you suddenly stopping?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: '■■■, this may sound a bit weird... but I feel like Commandant is just nearby.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'I am here.', 3: '18', 4: 'What are you two doing?', 5: '21'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Commandant?! Since when are you here... No, I guess you aren\'t "here."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '■■■■■ is on a mission. I just happened to be around and came to help.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Hmm. Looks like something must have happened to you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Explain the situation)', 3: '25'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Connection chamber, huh... I've heard about it in a meeting with the ■■■■■ Association before.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: '■■■■■, I think part of our conversation was blocked. Can you feel it...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Yeah, probably some special setting of the connection chamber... But why does it block our names in particular?', 4: '1'}
{1: '449', 2: 'But I can tell who you are. Lee and Sophia.', 3: '31', 4: "But why redact Lee's and Sophia's names?", 5: '31'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Wait a sec. So we are Lee and Sophia in Commandant's eyes... Oh!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It's also interfering with Commandant's vision, huh...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "We can say the names as Commandant sees us, but not our real ones. That's one complicated April Fool's joke.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: '...So I am Sophia to you now. Is that so, Commandant?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'And I am Lee... I guess this makes us the two musketeers now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: '...I think Lee will hate that title.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Ahem, Sophia, what are you talking about? I'm Lee now. And I think that's a good title.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "Now's not the time to mess around, ■■.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "True. Let's defeat the Corrupted and rescue our commandant. No one can escape my shots!", 4: '1'}
